mapper.select: select r.*, (select avg(r_grade) from c_review where c_idx = #{c_idx}) avg from (select * from c_review where c_idx = #{c_idx} order by r_grade desc) r where rownum = 1

select a.* from ( select ROWNUM as RNUM, b.* from ( select * from c_cafe
where c_addr like '%' || #{addrs} || '%'
where c_tag like '%' || #{c_tag} || '%'
order by c_idx desc ) b ) a where a.RNUM >= (#{page_num}*5)+1 and a.RNUM <= (#{page_num}*5)+5

select * from c_cafe
where c_addr like '%' || #{addrs} || '%'
where c_tag like '%' || #{c_tag} || '%'
select * from c_cafe where rownum <= 6 order by c_name
